      • intersection

        public static int intersection(Plane3D plane,
                               Line3D line,
                               Point3D inter_p)
        calculates the intersection point of a line with a plane.
        Parameters:
        plane - Plane3D object
        line - Line3D object
        inter_p - calculated intersection point.
        Returns:
        0 = disjoint (no intersection) 1 = intersection in the unique point inter_p 2 = the segment lies in the plane

        Returns:
        distance from p to reference point.

      • inCircle

        public boolean inCircle(double x,
                        double y,
                        double z,
                        double radius)
        Calculates is given point is in a circle with radius "radius" with the point of reference of the plane.
        Parameters:
        x - x component of the point
        y - y component of the point
        z - z component of the point
        radius - of the circle to check
        Returns:
        true - if the point is in the circle, false - otherwise

      • inCircle

        public boolean inCircle(Point3D p,
                        double radius)
        Calculates is given point is in a circle with radius "radius" with the point of reference of the plane.
        Parameters:
        p - point to be checked
        radius - of the circle to check
        Returns:
        true - if the point is in the circle, false - otherwise
